Description: Condition: Excellent with little to no signs of wear! The Buckshot guitar is perfect for any metal or rock player that wants to turn up the heat. It's features a solid korina body and a bolt-on roasted maple neck with a comfortable medium oval profile. It's equipped with high quality Reverend pin-lock tuners and a Tune-O-Matic bridge with stoptail. It's loaded with a Greasy T pickup in the bridge position and a Revtron pickup in the neck position. Features & Technical Specs: Body Wood: Solid Korina Body Color/Finish: Midnight Black Neck Wood: Roasted maple, satin amber finish Neck Profile: Medium oval Neck Radius: 12" Neck Joint: Bolt-on Fingerboard: Maple Fingerboard Inlays: Black Dots Frets: 22 medium jumbo Nut: Boneite Nut Width: 43mm Tuners: Reverend Pin-Lock Scale Length: 25-1/2" Bridge: Tune-O-Matic with Stoptail Pickups: Greasy T bridge, Revtron neck Controls: Volume, Tone, Bass Contour, 3-way Hardware Finish: Chrome Weight: Approx. 7.8 lbs. Case: Not included Country Of Origin: South Korea Serial Number: 30464 Weight: 7.33 lbs. Switching: 3-way pickup switch: P1 - Bridge pickup P2 - Bridge & neck pickups P3 - Neck pickup
Title: Reverend Buckshot with Roasted Maple Neck Midnight Black Premium Preowned
